== Contested deletion == This article should not be speedily deleted for lack of asserted importance because... (your reason here) It's borderline, but he was deputy district commissioner in the Punjab who investigated a notable attempted murder allegation by [[Henry Martyn Clark]] against [[Ghulam Ahmad]]. --[[User:In ictu oculi|In ictu oculi]] ([[User talk:In ictu oculi|talk]]) 03:34, 17 April 2013 (UTC)
== Letter 1939 M W Douglas ==
A scanned image of a letter has been included. Douglas vividly remembered the case and wrote to the Ahmadiyya Missionary (in reply to his query): 29th July 1939 United Service Club Pall Mall S W 1 Dear Imam sahib, The case against Mirza Ghulam Ahmad might have been tried, either in Amritsar or Gurdaspur District. It was transferred to Gurdaspur; and I tried it at Batala in 1897. The evidence was false; and thus I acquitted Mirza Ghulam Ahmad. (*******Signed*******) [Montagu William Douglas]
(I have received this letter on 31th July 1939 by post) (signed J.D.Shams)
the image is here:[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Montagu_William_Douglas_Letter_dated_29th_July_1939.jpg] [[User:Drali1954|ڈاکٹر محمد علی]] ([[User talk:Drali1954|talk]]) 17:17, 19 April 2013 (UTC)
